text: Edward Vincent McNeill (26 March 1929 – April 1979) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Sunderland. He died in April 1979 at the age of 50.SPORTING HEADLINES . . . . . from over the years that made the sports pages ==References== Category:1929 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Association footballers from Northern Ireland Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Dundalk F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:People from Warrenpoint Category:Portadown F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players
title: Ted McNeill
